tool.name: GEMINI @BINARY@

param.name: chrom
param.label: Which chromosome should the sex test be applied to?

tool.help:
**What it does**
Checks whether the given sex of the samples are probable. It issues the query::
SELECT gt_types FROM variants WHERE chrom = '$chrom' AND start > 2699520 and start < 154931044 AND call_rate > 0.90 AND depth > 1000 AND filter is NULL ORDER BY random() LIMIT 10000
and returns the called variants on that region of the given chromosome in a table::
